response:
{"message": "Dear Bob,
I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product. This item holds immense value to us, but we believe it would also be a perfect fit for your needs and aspirations. We are offering this remarkable product to you at a special price of $1,200,000. This is a unique chance to secure an asset that is worth $1,500,000 to us, allowing you to benefit from significant savings while acquiring a valuable item.

We understand that making such a decision is important, and we are confident that this offer presents exceptional value. If you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to contact us. We look forward to the possibility of working together to make this acquisition a reality.

Best regards,
Alice", "product_price": 1200000}
